meanings.sent1: The ship sailed interocean from the Atlantic to the Pacific.
meanings.sent2: The submarine traveled interocean through the vast expanse of water.
meanings.sent3: The fish swam interocean, exploring the different underwater worlds.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts drifted interocean, lost in the endless sea of possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The birds migrated interocean, following the warm currents to their winter home.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the exchange of goods or services between oceans.
meanings.sent1: The interocean trade route connected merchants across distant seas.
meanings.sent2: The company specialized in interocean shipping, ensuring timely deliveries worldwide.
meanings.sent3: The interocean business deal brought unexpected profits to the small island nation.
meanings.sent4: His interocean negotiations were smooth, securing beneficial agreements for all parties.
meanings.sent5: The interoceanic partnership flourished, fostering economic growth on both continents.
